content.description: Sit start the far right arête/face. There is short and tall man beta for this problem.
content.location: It ascends the far right arete.

content.description: Sit start with your left hand on a razor crimp and your right hand down lower on some texture in the faint corner. Bump your right hand to a credit card-sized crimp. Get your feet up, crank for the good bar up high, and then top out.
content.location: This problem starts sitting on the flat rock.

content.description: Sit start with your right hand on a decent square crimp and your left hand in the faint seam. Power up to a left hand micro-crimp. Snag a tiny, one finger hold on the arête, bump your right hand to a slopey dish, make a few more moves, and top out.
content.location: This problem starts on the bulging, faint arete.

content.description: Squat start with your left hand on a lower, small, sharp micro-crimp and your right hand on a higher, slopey dish. Move left, and match on the unique, flat plate. Keep your feet on, and grab the decent, right hand sidepull. Make a few more moves, and top out.
content.location: This problem roughly starts in the middle of the boulder.

content.description: Water Tower Boulder 1 is a good-sized block that has somehow flew beneath the radar. Its problems are arranged in order from left to right on the boulder.
